fields.label: Client ID
fields.tooltip: Enter the OAuth 2.0 Client ID that you receive from https://dev.fitbit.com/apps when you were creating the app
fields.name: client_id

fields.label: Client Secret
fields.tooltip: Enter the Client Secret that you receive from https://dev.fitbit.com/apps when you were creating the app
fields.name: client_secret

fields.label: Days for Coverage
fields.tooltip: Set the number of days for coverage of the user's steps. This would be a range from the current day back to the days that is defined here
fields.name: coverage_days

fields.label: Generate Activity Stream When Linking Account
fields.tooltip: This option determines if activity stream should be generated when the user links their account with Fitbit
fields.name: activity

fields.label: Allow User to Edit Dataset
fields.tooltip: This option determines if user's are allowed to edit their activity data set
fields.name: data_edit

fields.label: Limit Edit to Previous Days
fields.tooltip: This option determines if user's are allowed to edit all past activities or a specific number of days. To allow editing of all days, set this to 0
fields.name: data_edit_days

fields.label: Display Average Steps in Profile Cover
fields.tooltip: When enabled, user's average steps are displayed on their post cover
fields.name: display_widget
